annotations.text: 2018: Jan-Jun was a period of stability, with fairly steady growth(Averaging +3% per month). There was nearly 20% decrease in July, when product X was recalled and pulled from the market.

annotations.text: 2019: The year started at less than $1.6B, but increased markedly in February, when a new study was released. Total sales have increased steadily since then and this is projected to continue. The latest forecast is for $2.4B in monthly sales by the end of the year.
